name: ExcessiveRadiationDoseOrInadequateImageQualityForDiagnosticComputedTomographyNonDiagnosticOrNonCT
title: Excessive Radiation Dose or Inadequate Image Quality for Diagnostic Computed Tomography Non Diagnostic or Non CT
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The values in this set are derived from a combination of diagnostic CT examinations (including images and DICOM) and information from the electronic health record including CPT and ICD10 codes for the purposes of characterizing CT scans based on image quality and radiation dose requirements associated with the clinical reason for the scan and for normalizing the radiation dose for patient size. These values are used in calculating a performance measure based on diagnostic CT radiation dose and image quality.),(Data Element Scope: These data elements will be used for exclusion logic in our eCQM),(Inclusion Criteria: Non-Diagnostic CPT codes are included in this set, which is used for exclusion logic in the eCQM),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
